citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process from 12:00pn to
12:30pm on February 21, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the license by phone and Facebook message. Failure
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations.
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process from 12:00pn to 
12:30pm on February 21, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the license by phone and Facebook message. Failure 
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. 
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
